semantics.label: Dėlionės paveiksliukas
semantics.description: Paveiksliukas, iš kurio reikia pjauti dalis.

semantics.label: Plytelės horizontaliai
semantics.description: Nustatykite, kiek dėlionės plytelių turėtų būti dėlionėje horizontaliai.

semantics.label: Plytelės vertikaliai
semantics.description: Nustatykite, kiek dėlionės plytelių turėtų būti vertikaliai.

semantics.label: Garso nustatymai
semantics.description: Šiose parinktyse jūs galite nustatyti garso parinktis.

fields.label: Pick up puzzle tile
fields.description: Sound to play when a puzzle tile is picked up.

fields.label: Drop puzzle tile (incorrectly)
fields.description: Sound to play when a puzzle tile is dropped (in a wrong spot).

fields.label: Drop puzzle tile correctly
fields.description: Sound to play when a puzzle tile is dropped in the correct spot.

fields.label: Complete puzzle
fields.description: Sound to play when a puzzle is completed.

semantics.label: Veikimo nustatymai
semantics.description: Šios parinktys leis jums valdyti, kaip veikia užduotis.

fields.label: Show faint background
fields.description: Show a faint version of the image in the background to indicate where a puzzle tile needs to go.

fields.label: Show puzzle outlines
fields.description: Show puzzle outlines to indicate where a puzzle tile needs to go.

fields.label: Sorting space position
fields.description: Set where the sorting space should be positioned at.

fields.label: Sorting space
fields.description: Set how much space in percent should be attached next to the jigsaw puzzle for sorting the tiles.

fields.label: Sorting space
fields.description: Set how much space in percent relative to the puzzle should be attached below to the jigsaw puzzle for sorting the tiles.

fields.label: Use full area
fields.description: Set if initially the tiles should cover the complete area including the area where they need to be dropped.

fields.label: Text for "No image" message
fields.default: There was no image given for this jigsaw puzzle.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Complete" button
fields.default: Complete the puzzle. All tiles will be put to their correct position.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the puzzle. All puzzle tiles will be shuffled on the canvas.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Enter fullscreen button"
Assistive technology description for "Exit fullscreen button"
